common_issues.title: PiecesOS services failing to open on MacOS
common_issues.description: Multiple users are unable to open Pieces Settings Service or Pieces Core Services on MacOS.  The Settings Service issue involves a type registration error within GetIt, while the Core Services issue shows a WebSocket connection failure with a 404 error.  Potential solutions include reinstalling Pieces OS, checking firewall settings, and ensuring the correct ports are open.

common_issues.title: Pieces OS users unable to open Copilot or Core Services
common_issues.description: Multiple MacOS users reported inability to open Pieces Copilot or Core Services due to connection issues.  Errors include "Instance of 'fp'" and websocket connection failures. Commonalities include Pieces OS installations on MacOS 15.5 or 15.6, and potential port conflicts on local port 39300.  Suggested solutions include checking firewall settings, verifying Pieces OS version compatibility, and restarting the application or the machine.

common_issues.title: Pieces OS 12.1.x macOS issues: Hotkeys, MCP, and Settings Service
common_issues.description: Users on macOS running Pieces OS 12.1.x are experiencing issues with hotkeys not working, MCP in Cursor repeatedly going down, and an "Invalid argument" error when opening Pieces Settings Service.  The hotkey issue involves all key combinations producing the macOS error sound. The MCP issue requires toggling the setting in Cursor every 5-10 minutes. The Settings Service error mentions a type registration conflict. Further investigation is needed to determine root causes and solutions.

related_issues.title: No hotkeys work
related_issues.text:
No hotkeys work
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

12.1.0

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

None of the hotkeys work at all. Every hotkey combination produces the macos sound and nothing happens. No keys at all do anything, hotkey or not - they all produce that same macos sound and nothing happens.

common_issues.title: Pieces OS and Desktop App Installation and Upgrade Issues
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing problems with Pieces OS and Desktop App installation, upgrades, and Pro checkout. Issues include the "Ensure core dependencies" step failing, the checkout modal not opening, and the Pieces Copilot Service failing to open.  Check Pieces OS version compatibility, ensure a stable internet connection, and try reinstalling or restarting the application. Provide logs and device information for further assistance.

related_issues.title: Pieces Pro: checkout is not opening
related_issues.text: Pieces Pro: checkout is not opening ### Checked for Existing Issues? - [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this. ### Software Desktop Application ### Operating System / Platform Windows ### Your Pieces OS Version 12.1.1 ### Early Access Program - [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature. ### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug. Hi guys! I want to try a "Pro" plan, however the modal with payment is not opening and the button "Upgrade Now" turns to "Awaiting checkout..." and nothing happens. I've tried through the Desktop App, Pieces OS app - neither helped. Could you please advice? Default Browser: Arc (if it helps) PiecesOs Log Attached [log-08102025.txt](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/21704376/log-08102025.txt) Pieces for Developers log string: ``` [D] Checking PiecesOS Connection and Compatibility [D] Checking PiecesOS Version Number via port: 39300 [D] Checking PiecesOS Connection and Compatibility [D] Checking PiecesOS Version Number via port: 39300 [D] App Interaction: app_header_searchbar_settings_button_popover_button [D] Checking PiecesOS Connection and Compatibility [D] Checking PiecesOS Version Number via port: 39300 [D] Dispatching Route [DIALOG OPEN]: true [D] Dispatching Route [SHEET OPEN]: false [D] Dispatching Route [CURRENT ROUTE]: PiecesProInformationDialog [D] Dispatching Route [ROUTE STACK]: [/workstream, PiecesProInformationDialog] [D] Dispatching Route [ENTRY]: / [D] Dispatching Route [HOME]: /workstream [D] App Interaction: app_header_searchbar_settings_button_popover_upgrade_to_pro_button [D] Dispatching Route [DIALOG OPEN]: false [D] Dispatching Route [SHEET OPEN]: false [D] Dispatching Route [CURRENT ROUTE]: /workstream [D] Dispatching Route [ROUTE STACK]: [/workstream] [D] Dispatching Route [ENTRY]: / [D] Dispatching Route [HOME]: /workstream [D] Checking PiecesOS Connection and Compatibility [D] Checking PiecesOS Version Number via port: 39300 ``` Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

common_issues.title: Pieces OS and Desktop App Issues
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing issues with Pieces OS and the Desktop App, including personal domain names reverting to null.pieces.cloud, "Ensure core dependencies" step failing, and the Pro plan checkout not opening.  The issues appear across Windows and Linux and may involve Pieces OS version 12.1.1 and Desktop App version 4.3.1. Further investigation is needed to identify the root causes and solutions.

related_issues.title: Filling out Personal Domain in Pieces OS leads to null.pieces.cloud
related_issues.text: Filling out Personal Domain in Pieces OS leads to null.pieces.cloud ### Checked for Existing Issues? - [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this. ### Software Desktop Application ### Operating System / Platform Windows ### Your Pieces OS Version 12.1.1 ### Early Access Program - [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature. ### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug. Hi, If I edit the username of my personal domain, it takes a couple of minutes before it's named "null.pieces.cloud." It doesn't matter whether the username contains only letters or a combination of letters and numbers. No spaces or uppercase letters are used. I'm using the Desktop App Version 4.3.1 Regards Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

recommendations: Prioritize resolving issues related to opening Pieces Copilot and Core Services on MacOS, focusing on potential port conflicts and version compatibility with MacOS 15.5, 15.6, and 15.7.
Investigate and address the "Type ZJb is already registered inside GetIt" error preventing users from opening the Pieces Settings Service on MacOS.
Address the issue of personal domain names reverting to null.pieces.cloud on Windows.
Troubleshoot and resolve the "Ensure core dependencies" step failure during Pieces OS and Desktop App installation on Linux.
Fix the Pro plan checkout modal not opening on Windows and MacOS, specifically investigating compatibility with the Arc browser.
Look into the reports of all hotkeys failing and producing the MacOS error sound for users on MacOS running Pieces OS 12.1.0.
Investigate the issue with MCP in Cursor repeatedly going down for users on MacOS running Pieces OS 12.1.0.
Address the inability to drag files into the conversation context.
